name: Einlanzer
description: Einlanzer is a full-scale, epic fantasy role-playing game. The 40+ hour story of Einlanzer is deep, thought-provoking, and emotional, while remaining light-hearted and fun at times. Expect a strategic battle system, massive scope, regularly added content, and difficult moral decisions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 640 x 480 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 550 MB available space Additional Notes: Pretty much a potato could run this game! ;-)
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM
